titleStmt.title: The maydens dreme compyled and made by Chrystofer Goodwyn, in the yere of our Lorde. M.CCCCC.xlij
Songe de la pucelle. English.
titleStmt.author: Goodwin, Christopher.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me Robert wyer, for Richarde Bankes,

notesStmt.note: Largely a translation by Goodwin of: Le songe de la pucelle.
Printer's and publisher's names from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
